Courses.Name: AWS Certified Security - Specialty
Courses.Description: Covers advanced security topics and best practices for securing AWS environments.

Courses.Name: Azure Security Technologies (AZ-500)
Courses.Description: Focuses on implementing security controls and threat protection, managing identity and access, and more.

Courses.Name: Google Cloud Certified - Professional Cloud Security Engineer
Courses.Description: Demonstrates your ability to design and implement security policies and controls on Google Cloud Platform.

Courses.Name: Certificate of Cloud Security Knowledge (CCSK)
Courses.Description: Covers fundamental cloud security concepts and best practices.

Courses.Name: CompTIA Cloud+
Courses.Description: Covers a broad range of cloud-related skills, including security, in a vendor-neutral way.

Courses.Name: GIAC Cloud Security Automation (GCSA)
Courses.Description: Focuses on automating and securing cloud environments.

Courses.Name: Professional Cloud Security Engineer
Courses.Description: Demonstrates your expertise in implementing and managing security on Google Cloud Platform.

Courses.Name: Certified Kubernetes Security Specialist (CKS)
Courses.Description: Certifies your knowledge in securing containerized applications using Kubernetes.

Courses.Name: Dark Side Ops Azure - Cloud Pentesting Training
Courses.Description: Focuses on practical cloud penetration testing in Microsoft Azure.

Certifications.Name: Certified Cloud Security Professional (CCSP)
Certifications.Description: Recognized globally, the CCSP certifies your knowledge and skills in cloud security architecture, design, operations, and more.

Certifications.Name: Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP)
Certifications.Description: A widely recognized certification covering various domains, including security and risk management, asset security, and more.
